title: Attend Mid-South Paint Horse Show and Stay at Hampton & Suites Scottsboro
text:
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, AL offers comfortable lodging for the Mid-South Paint Horse Fall Show at Northeast Alabama Agri-Business Center on September 19, 2015.
 SCOTTSBORO, AL, September 11, Guests attending the Mid-South Paint Horse Fall Show and Futurity will find comfortable lodging at the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama hotel . The event is scheduled for September 19 at the Northeast Alabama Agri-Business Center in nearby Rainsville. The show begins at 8am. Flat fee registration will be $200 per horse, which includes all classes.
"Our award winning property is a top hotel choice in Scottsboro," comments Debra Luke, General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro. "We are happy to welcome guests attending the Mid-South Paint Horse Show," continues Ms. Luke.
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro offers non-smoking standard rooms and king studio suites with free high speed Internet and Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . Guests will appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave and mini refrigerator. Hampton's complimentary On the House Breakfast, with hot and cold favorites, is a healthy way to start the day. On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option on weekday mornings. Travelers will find outstanding hotel amenities including a fitness center, business center, and refreshing outdoor pool. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry Market carries snacks, beverages, and sundries. This property is just minutes from Lake Guntersville, and the hotel has plenty of boat trailer parking with charging stations. The Hampton Inn & Suites hotel near downtown Scottsboro recently received the Lighthouse Award, the highest honor for the Hampton brand.
Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package and the Shop and Drop Package, with discounts from Unclaimed Baggage. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. HHonors toward free hotel nights. The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro is close to area attractions including Goose Pond Colony, Cathedral Caverns State Park, and Hampton Cove Golf Course on Alabama's Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail.
For directions to the Mid-South Paint Horse Fall Show, visit www.nealagribusinesscenter.com . To Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro AL hotel , call (256)259-5200 or visit online at www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com .
About Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama Hotel
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro hotel in Alabama is located in the mountain/lakes region of northern Alabama surrounded by majestic mountains and rich valleys, located minutes from Lake Guntersville. Whether in town for business or pleasure, Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro has been designed with your comfort in mind, from boat parking to complimentary high-speed Internet access; your comfort is their main goal. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms and suites features the Clean & Fresh Hampton bed, mini refrigerator, microwave, work desk, basic cable plus HBO, and 37 inch flat panel TV.
